Perspectives

Wed Jun 26 2024 02:00:00 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

In my day to day conversations, subjective and objective are being passed around quite often, to frame a certain standpoint or to ground a fact. Only two of these seems little, so I thought, but it turns out there 4!

  • Subjective
  • objective -intersubjective
  • interobjective
